subject: Figure Skating
Olympic Games (2014)
Skiing
World Cup (Skiing)
lead_paragraph: The American Mikaela Shiffrin easily won the World Cup slalom opener in Levi, Finland, on Saturday, beating the Olympic champion Maria Höfl-Riesch of Germany.
snippet: The American Mikaela Shiffrin easily won the World Cup slalom opener in Levi, Finland, on Saturday, beating the Olympic champion Maria Höfl-Riesch of Germany.
